MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL59 postcode area of Menai Bridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.40pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:32pm on 16th January 2021.
